snippet: As chairman of the Joint Chiefs under Presidents Carter and Reagan, General Jones set in motion a sweeping reorganization of the nation’s military command.
abstract: David C Jones, who as chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff under Presidents Jimmy Carter and Ronald Reagan set in motion a sweeping reorganization of the nation's military command, dies at age 92.
lead_paragraph: As chairman of the Joint Chiefs under Presidents Carter and Reagan, General Jones set in motion a sweeping reorganization of the nation’s military command.

headline.main: Gen. David C. Jones, Former Chairman of Joint Chiefs, Dies at 92
headline.print_headline: Gen. David C. Jones Is Dead at 92; Former Chairman of Joint Chiefs

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
